oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Squire Hayes
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Copy print portrait of Esquire "Squire" Hayes (Hays) (1858-1947).

Squire Hayes was born in Kerrville, Tennessee on February 9, 1858, died on March 18, 1947, and is buried in the Union Hill Cemetery in Munford, Tennessee. He was the son of William Henry Hayes and Mary Elizabeth Hayes. He married three times to: Mae Frances Williams from Crawley Ridge, Arkansas, Lizzie Hood from Marion, Arkansas (1893) and Pinkey Reddit (Reddick) (1904). He had twelve children: William, Joseph, Benjamin, Oscar, Eddie, Herman, Anthony, Mike, Ziller, Agusta, Mary, Booker, and Armantha.
